ValueSet-IMMZD18SMeningococcalMonovalent.title: IMMZD18SMeningococcalMonovalentMenCConjugateVaccine ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
ValueSet-IMMZD18SMeningococcalMonovalent.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD18SMeningococcalMonovalentMenCConjugateVaccine ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#First meningococcal dose from the primary series was administered-338

http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#First meningococcal dose from the primary series was administered and client started the series when client's age was less than or equal to 11 months-237

http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Second meningococcal dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed for clients that started the series when client's age was less than or equal to 11 months-99
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The primary series has been completed and client started the series when client's age was less than or equal to 11 months-236

http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Meningococcal booster dose was administered for the client that started the series when client's age was less than or equal to 11 months. Immunization schedule has been completed-120
ValueSet-IMMZD18SMeningococcalMonovalent.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD18SMeningococcalMonovalentMenCConjugateVaccine ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD18SMeningococcalMonovalentMenCConjugateVaccineVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
